translations.text: May the hands of Abu Lahab perish, and he ˹himself˺ perish!
Neither his wealth nor ˹worldly˺ gains will benefit him.
He will burn in a flaming Fire,
and ˹so will˺ his wife, the carrier of ˹thorny˺ kindling,<sup foot_note=77643>1</sup>
around her neck will be a rope of palm-fibre.<sup foot_note=77644>1</sup>

meta.translation_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
